public delegate void StartupNextInstanceEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StartupNextInstanceEventArgs ^ e);
type StartupNextInstanceEventHandler = delegate of obj * StartupNextInstanceEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A object that contains the event data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In Visual Basic, you do not need to work with this delegate explicitly. For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>.
## Examples <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance?displayProperty=nameWithType>
